## SLOs for Week 07

By the end of this unit, students will be able to...

1.  Design and implement a database system from scratch.
2.  Write SQL queries to solve real-world data retrieval problems.
3.  Present a comprehensive database solution addressing a given scenario.
4.  Compare different database designs and justify choices.
5.  Demonstrate proficiency in SQL and database management concepts.
6.  Reflect on the course content and their learning experience.
